tag_list: pat-meier-johnson, lunchat, pat-meier-associates-pr, bay-area-pr, public-relations, tech-pr, tech-events, event-production, product-showcase, travel-tech, mobile-tech, pow-wow, ces
overview: Pat Meier-Johnson is the CEO of Pat Meier Associates Public Relations, a public relations and communications events firm that specializes in serving the technology, consumer electronics and travel industries. Located in the San Francisco Bay Area, the agency provides full service PR, media production and communications services and produces the Lunchat and Connected Traveler Technology product showcases during CES and other technology and travel trade shows.
